articles.title: Stillwater: Matt Damon goes full MAGA in drama that might just get him an Oscar - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: REVIEW: Hollywood hasn't had much time or empathy for the illiberal, white American male recently, but this might help to balance the ledger a little.
articles.content:
Stillwater (M, 139 mins) Directed by Tom McCarthy ***½
 In the French city of Marseilles, a young American woman languishes in prison.

articles.author: Matthew Knott
articles.title: America had a chance to crush COVID but blew it - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The high rate of vaccine refusal in the US has revealed the dark side of American individualism and liberty: selfishness and a lack of empathy.
articles.content:
The reason is simple, tragic and entirely preventable. Not enough Americans have been willing to get vaccinated, despite having access to an abundance of free and stunningly effective vaccines.
A de… [+5342 chars]
